  • Method Details

    • head

      CompletableFuture<net.kyori.adventure.text.Component> head(@NotNull @NotNull UUID playerId)
      Returns the chat component representing the given player's head. For online players, the head is instantly available and CompletableFuture.get() can be used without blocking the main thread. For offline players, each head is cached for 5 minutes so subsequent requests for the same head are instantly available.
      Parameters:
      playerId - the player's UUID
      Returns:
      a future that will complete with the head component

    • icons

      Collection<TextIcon> icons()
      Returns a list of all loaded text icons.
      Returns:
      A set of loaded text icons.

    • findIcon

      Optional<TextIcon> findIcon(@NotNull @NotNull String name)
      Returns the text icon for the given name.
      Parameters:
      name - icon to search for
      Returns:
      The text icon that matches this name

    • addIcon

      void addIcon(@NotNull @NotNull String name, @NotNull @NotNull BufferedImage image)
      Register a text icon for the given name and image.
      Parameters:
      name - The icon name
      image - The icon image

    • addIcons

      void addIcons(@NotNull @NotNull String[] names, @NotNull @NotNull BufferedImage sheet, int hAmount, int vAmount, int hGap, int vGap)
      Register a set of text icons with the given names and sprite sheet.
      Parameters:
      names - The icon names going from left to right, top to bottom
      sheet - The sprite sheet

    • removeIcon

      void removeIcon(@NotNull @NotNull String name)
      Remove a text icon with the given name.
      Parameters:
      name - The icon name

    • parse

      net.kyori.adventure.text.Component parse(@NotNull @NotNull BufferedImage image, int offsetX, int offsetY)
      Parse the pixels of an image at the given x and y coordinate into a Text Component
      Parameters:
      image - The image to parse
      offsetX - The starting x coordinate
      offsetY - The starting y coordinate
      Returns:
      The parsed text component
